entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 3:37 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 10.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 10.1°C
Wind: SW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
